page.title: 16Pubs & hotel at Bourne End
page.content: {BUSINESS MAN'S TRADE.} The hotel is built on the site of an old cornmill and the waterwheel has been incorporated into the design, which was built 13 years ago. It is a busy conference and business hotel having 40 bedrooms,banqueting suites for 100 people and a 50 seater restaurant.Accomodation of double bedroom with private bathroom,is usually fully booked from Monday to Thursday and conference facilities Monday to Friday. This trade comes mainly from the Maylands Industrial Estate. August is the quietest month.September to December is the busiest time for conferences. The pubs have little business trade by comparison.A few local business men will come to them for a pub lunch particularly during the Summer months at the pub by the canal.
